item.title: FIX ping: command not found
item.description: root@nsa310:~# ping -bash: ping: command not found here is simple solution # aptitude install inetutils-tools inetutils-ping test it root@nsa310:~# ping 127.0.0.1 PING 127.0.0.1 (127.0.0.1): 56 data bytes 64 bytes from 127.0.0.1: icmp_seq=0 ttl=64 time=0.128 ms 64 bytes from 127.0.0.1: icmp_seq=1 ttl=64 time=0.091 ms ^C--- 127.0.0.1 ping statistics --- 2 packets transmitted, 2 packets received, 0% packet loss round-trip min/avg/max/stddev = 0.091/0.110/0.128/0.000 ms
